CustomField.description: The API Name of the field on the Sales Agreement that references the Quote used to create this Sales Agreement. Must be a reference to a Standard or CPQ Quote. Default field is Quote__c.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API Name of the field on the Sales Agreement that references the Quote used to create this Sales Agreement. Must be a reference to a Standard or CPQ Quote. Default field is Quote__c.
CustomField.label: Sales Agreement Quote Field
